title: Progress Lighting P3688-09 Alabaster Glass One-Light Flush Mount, 11 1/2"D x 3 3/4"H, Brushed Nickel
features: Transitional Brushed Nickel 11-1/2 inch close-to-ceiling fixture
Twist on glass for easy installation
description: One-light clean transitional 11-1/2 inch close-to-ceiling fixture with etched alabaster style glass. This fixture is ideal for bedrooms, hallways, laundry, utility rooms, dens, kitchens, closets, bathrooms and foyers. Easy to install and has twist on glass for easy bulb replacement. Uses one 60W Max medium base lamp. This fixture attaches to the ceiling with little to no gap between the light fixture and the ceiling.

Clean design with elegant lines is complemented by a satin finish, alabaster glass shade. Unique twist-lock shade provides both easy access for changing light bulbs and a clutter-free exterior since no external hardware is required to secure the glass. One-Light close-to-ceiling fixture with etched alabaster style glass. Twist on glass for easy relamping. Uses (1) 60-Watt medium base bulb 11-1/2-Inch Diameter by 3-3/4-Inch Height
